website_summaries.verdict: An all-around excellent camera with more stellar features than we can list here, including its impressive time-lapse, burst photo, and timer-shoot modes, which are made even better by the APEMAN’s gorgeous 4K resolution and easy-to-use interface.
pros: 5 timer options: 100 milliseconds, 200 milliseconds, 500 milliseconds, 1 second, and 5 seconds
cons: Not all memory cards are compatible with the APEMAN, so you may have to purchase a new one for this time-lapse camera

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I took the Apeman to the Florida Keys specifically to practice photography while SCUBA diving. These pictures are from a fairly shallow dive 40- 50 ft. I used an underwater diving rig to mount the camera and 2 LED lights. The clarity is good and in diving mode the color is not bad. I did enhance these photos after I got home but the originals weren't too far off. For the price it's a great little underwater camera. I got everything I needed to take these photos for $200. I think that was a good investment. It's also really easy to use. The instructions are simple and there are plenty of options in the menu.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Woman

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: It is have warranty? My camera under water one time .But does not work.can I ask for other new one.
customer_reviews.author: wai kwan

customer_reviews.title: Video quality becomes poor in long clips
customer_reviews.text: Seems a much thought-through design than other cheaper $50 4K action cams in terms of build, interface, and the app. However, the lens is smaller than the latest offerings from other makers which means less light collection ability. The worst drawback I noticed and confirmed is that the video quality is great at the start but becomes much poorer at the end of >15min long clips. Not sure the issue is due to overheat of the sensor or loosing focus overtime.
customer_reviews.author: PulseAmp

customer_reviews.title: Lasted couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 5 stars before because the item worked and did everything it was supposed to. Not even a month passed by before this item stopped working and couldn’t recognize my memory card, had to return for this reason, and change to 1 Star it’s pricey so I would have thought it would have lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Broke in the case within 2 weeks of owning it. I thought I would save a few bucks and go with a cheaper model over a GoPro and was left with a smashed screen. It is very difficult to use too and the battery life isn't great. I'm sure it will fit some peoples needs, but my experience has been extremely negative.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for the price. It takes nice video underwater and records smoothly when bumping around. It connects easily to my phone and stays connected all night long when I use it as a security camera. The menu is easy to cycle through wether you use the buttons on the camera or the settings menu on the app. The app even tells you how much recording time remains based on how resolution is set. It comes in a nice protective case with an extra battery and plenty of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: bluemoose

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but you get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful what you buy with Apeman. I ordered a specific model, but received the lesser model. After reaching out for a swap, they sent me the lesser model again. Purchased this for my boy. I shouldn’t expect GoPro quality stabilization, but Apeman is far from their stabilization technology. I really wonder if it stabilizes at all. Great price, but you get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I returned the camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to make diving videos and photos, but I haven't an opportunity to dive this month. So, I decided to test this camera on regular tasks, like driving or even walking. Installed on my car, the cam lost all the setup. Using the motion detection mode, It stopped shooting even with the car moving and with other cars in front and moving too (of course). The EIS, I think it doesn't work. The image isn't sharp, hasn't good quality, looks like blurred and shakes a lot... So, if out off water is this way, I can't imagine underwater...
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, well equipped
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these (one for me, one for the wife) for a dive to the Vandenberg. Dive is at 100ft and this camera case is rated to 130ft...so hopefully we'll be ok. Also excited to use the dive mode. I plan to also use my old (original) GoPro so I will let you all know how they compare. Screen is not touch screen but is very easy to navigate with the buttons. Impressed with camera's customizable features such as picture quality, field of view and anti-shake. Really like the storage bag and other accessories that comes with the camera. Quality is good. I'll update my review when we back!
customer_reviews.author: J. Grgich

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter last year. She uses it to make movies with her friends. We also took it to Hawaii and used it underwater. The entire family loves this camera. It is easy to use, lightweight, and good quality. It is a really good quality for the price. We cracked the case shortly after receiving it and customer service was excellent -- got a new one out to us. I would absolutely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bargain bundle
customer_reviews.text: Actually I don’t think it is an real 4K camera but very ok video quality to use daily. Around or under 50bucks , I also don’t think you can find better one with all-in-all package which includes bag, waterproof case, all kinds of adapter and two batteries. I must admit you should not buy it if you need a real 4K action camera but you shall buy it if you don’t have any action camera. The setting is fairly simple and it’s operation is almost identical to usual dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far, but needs more testing
customer_reviews.text: So far, the quality seems to be pretty decent. Will have to continue to try to record while using anti shake and gyroscope on. Tried recording using those two modes while mounted on a bike and footage was unusable. Will have to try it again soon. Used this to record at universal studios recently with just the anti shake on while walking around the park at 140° viewing angle as a vlog setup and am happy with the content this little action cam got. Will update the review once I get more footage with the two modes mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: this is very nice little camera, i have been using ti for awhile now, really love time lapse mode. While i am sitting at the beach i can record sunset in time lapse mode, really cool feature. Video quality is great and comes with all accessories and nice caring case for convenient transport.
customer_reviews.author: WOLCOT

customer_reviews.title: Issues with the data in the descriotion
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the camera at this point but I gave it all 3 stars but will review at a later point. My issue is when I ordered the camera and after checking the manufactures web site they both said it would take a 64 GB card. Which I ordered at the same time. When I read the instructions it said it took up to a 32 GB card. So here I have 1 64 GB cards that WILL NOT WORK, so I went out and got a 32 GB and the camera so far is working. So far the buttons are a little touchy but it is letting me set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: keyriverguy

customer_reviews.title: Good camera crappy phone companion app
customer_reviews.text: I like this action camera a lot however the flaw is the software they use with it to pair on your phone. Half in Chinese or icons and poor download speed over WiFi, you don’t know where to find them after you’ve downloaded them only to see you have to download them and then save to your phone 🤦‍♂️. I did notice when you download over WiFi this thing gets so hot it will burning you on the side with the charger port. Everyone uses their mobile device now, we are not in the PC age anymore unfortunately, make an app or get a brewer one.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerEagan

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I just starting blogging my trekking and biking and this camera is great for outdoor activities. Indoor it works great too. I like that how many effects and mode set up this camera has! I can change the mode so many times and take such nice pictures. Another best part about this camera is it’s size. It’s perfect for my purse so I can take it everywhere. Really enjoying this camera and saving My trekking memories.
customer_reviews.author: Trina94

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your $ buy the A77 model instead
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at first. But now if it gets jarred or bumped it shuts off making it horrible if using on a motorcycle. Also the the camera menus are a bit of a pain to navigate. Where on the A77 easier to use. Example would be deleting videos. You have to go through the entire menu just to find delete. The wifi button is also annoying because its also your up button and if you tap it by mistake you have to wait for it to prompt you to refresh your wifi to back out of it. For over all features i would just buy the A77 model it works a lot better and its cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Exellent!
customer_reviews.text: My husband rides dirt bikes all over so I bought this camera to surprise him. Without having the first clue what I was even buying... and he LOVED it. He was so impressed with the case full of accessories for it and even further impressed that it seems to configure to the, "big name brand" connections. [His friend left a mount for his expensive, "big name brand" camera on his bike and this one connected right to it, like they came together. Win!] His friend has already passed on a couple extra accessories he had, as well, so it's great how versatile it is!
customer_reviews.author: Tam Z

customer_reviews.title: Not for diving,  poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for scuba diving, and the quality is not good at all, you can hardly see what's in the pictures. Definitely not 4K. I am very disappointed in the camera. If I were back in the states I would return it immediately, but sadly I wont be back for another few months. Would love my money back, but doubt itll happen. And there wasnt an instruction manual for all the accessories! No idea how to use them
customer_reviews.author: Devann Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good Cam, Suspect Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: It has great features and takes some nice videos. The still photos are passable, but your phone will do alot better. Works remarkable as a web cam. I returned it after only a few days due to a malfunctioning screen. It just got really dim, and started flickering. I'd be hesitant to purchase it again. Edit - I am bumping this up to a 5-star for the customer service alone. Not alot of sellers would go through such lengths to ensure that the customer is not left with a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: T.Bkk

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic camera but...
customer_reviews.text: It will not connect to my Android phone or tablet. The controls are kind of counterintuitive and buttons are placed where just casual handling it will result in accidental pressing. As I get more used to it, that might not happen as often though. But not being able to control it with my phone is seriously limiting. It might not sound like much but it's needed for being able to frame the shot and for controlling it remotely. At this rate, I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chae

customer_reviews.title: Just average
customer_reviews.text: Just ok.i was not pleased with the quality of the images or video when I went scuba diving.. I would classify the quality as being just average.. Some pictures came out nicely but most seemed very grainy...I tried all settings but just couldn't improve.. for the price I guess I shouldn't expect GoPro quality.... UPDATED: the button in the waterproof case stopped working so I couldn't take pictures when underwater.. the quality is "cloudy" when taking pictures underwater.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Cason

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the Gopro fo less cost with one exception
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Performance rivals $300 gopro with this exception... One warning: this item is NOT SUBMERSIBLE. It comes with a case for submersion but it leaked. Now YMMV. Its entirely possible thos leakage was due to user error. I dont read directions so, if you do? You may have better luck. After submersion, the unit stopped working. After drying it out for a week I was pleasantly surprised to find it again worked. P.S. The mobile app works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Many capabilities in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few of these small cameras and this is one of the better ones. The packaging is great and includes all types of accessories and mounting options as well as a n ongoing carrying case. The included dual batteries are 1050mAh but if you get the extra batteries, these are 30% larger at1350 mAh. Have run a few flights on drones and the returning image is very clear. One of the best capabilities is the WiFi broadcast the image to see and control the functions. The image download to your phone is a little slow.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Judy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device and wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I had the product in TWO DAY...TWO DAY...regular shipping. Excellent customer service. I love the product. On Android, find the "Go Camera" app (just a helpful hint). You won't believe the carrying case and accessories that come with it--a lot. Also, many have asked if it can be used as a PC camera. Absolutely, hooked it up with supplied cable, immediately a screen offers you "Mass Storage" or "PC Camera." Choose what you want, and off you go. Perfect. Do yourself a favor. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: TMF

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First, I'll admit, I'm not to tech savy. So I needed a camera that wasn't to confusing, and easy to use.The Apeman fit that criteria. While it was it can be a little confusing, just take your time, be patient, and walk thru each step. You'll get there. Connecting the WIFI to my laptop was probably the most confusing, but was achieved. The video/photos are good, audio is slight, but audible. I had to return a competitors camera due to it being so complex. I would recommend this camera to my friends. Good product for the $. Why spend 300+$?
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a GoPro. for my motorbike, but when I checked the price-tag for the original GoPro it was too high. Then I started searching and came across. this one. It does everything GoPro does and it comes with a ton of attachment, so you don't even need to buy an extra accessories kit. I literally cannot think of anything you can't attach it to. I use it with card, which works with no problems. It comes with two batteries so you don't need to worry about the power. Also each battery takes a long time to empty. No issues
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Looks good to me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to get an action camera for my son and also needed one that would function as a web cam, and the apeman A80 met both those needs. Included in the box are many mounting attachments, two batteries and almost everything needed to start capturing footage. Luckily, I had a 64 GB micro SD card lying around for which I had to read the manual to figure out how to format to be recognized by the camera. Beyond that, we’ve used the apeman A80 multiple times, nothing extreme so far, but everything has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome action camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy purchased this camera. I used to have a GoPro 4, this camera's totally comparable with it about video resolution, stabilization, and the design. however, the price is affordable and way cheaper than Gopro 4. it also comes with accessories that I need for a long trip. I'm so happy having this camera for my next adventure trips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Viet Hai

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the features set and quality for the price. I got this on a Lightning deal and have to say for the price this is a winner. I haven't used it many times, but the video is very good in good lighting. I have found I keep it on 1080p at 60 frames per second for the best results. It has pages of settings to customize the camera and the accessories it comes with as well as the camera is cheaper than accessories only for the Gopro. I bought it for an Alaskan trip in July so hopefully it holds up. Time will tell, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D

customer_reviews.title: Find another camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera after reading the good reviews. It arrived promptly and came in a decent little case. The camera itself feels like an extremely cheap plastic. It has been difficult to get it up and going-and difficult to figure out how to do simple things like get on Wi-Fi or get the camera to recognize the SD card. All the apps that are supposed to get you connected via Wi-Fi are terrible. I literally got a headache trying for the second day to get it up and running-but the terrible, shoddy app was the final straw-I will Be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Clay

customer_reviews.title: Why should I spend hundreds of dollar for some other brand?
customer_reviews.text: This Apeman action camera is great. The picture quality is great, the materials used are in good quality, and the price is what an action camera should be if the manufacture does not spend so much on advertising. I have a couple of Apeman products and intend to buy more. The customer service is responsive to comments, questions and support. Buy a great action camera without breaking your bank.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Do your research,  not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far from what I can tell the quality of this cam is pretty good. Even hooked it up to my phone. There is like a 1-2 sec delay from when it will show on your phone. Battery: it comes with a usb cable. I plugged it up to charge, the manual says it takes 3.5 hours to charge. But for some reason it was not charging properly, I'm not sure why. While charging the led light is supposed to be red, and when fully charged it's supposed to be blue. While charging, my light was blue. Initially the red light was showing but it went away. Although it's showing that it's not fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Playback video never worked when you touch settings
customer_reviews.text: Update dont mess with the settings and it was fine no plug in mic tho so no vlogging. Idk what's wrong with the camera this is my second one the date and time never stay the same so everytime it dies or I gotta change he battery its January again. Second is I cannot play back any videos everything is in fast forward mode I have the right s.d card class 10 and 64 gigs..
customer_reviews.author: santana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just awesome. Didn't want to pay hundreds of dollars for the gopro but this one exceeded my expectations. First of all, it comes with a lot of attachment accessories that allow it to fit standard mounts etc. I took it out on a swim in the water (attached to my snorkeling mask) and it did its job just fine. Great picture quality and FPS. I'm very pleased with it for this kinda price!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: The camera you didn't think you needed.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use & take pictures. It's easy to see why people would buy 2 or 3 than invest in 1 go pro. Price point is good. 1080p is the benchmark. If you are doing a production project this keeps you on budget. Picture quality is very close to true. Professionals know they need a filter......The carry bag is a plus with attachments for various active shots including under water.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product came with alot of accessories and in a nice case. I like the way the camera feels in the hands. The picture quality is ok for the price. The battery life is ok, but it comes with two batteries. So once again that's alot of bang for your buck. Also, battery life can vary based on your settings. For example: the battery drains more if you shoot in 4k, but the battery life last much longer shooting in 720p. As for video quality, I haven't been able to test it outside, but it looks good when I play with it indoors. It's also a great web cam shooting at 1080pm at 30fps.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn good for the price, best shot in 2.7 or 4k. EIS is good, not great. Better than my other less than $100.00 Chinese action cameras. This will be used for a couple of my drones...Customer service was outstanding replacing a battery that was missing, in fact they sent me the two battery and dual charger kit in just a couple days. I'm very happy and can't thank them enough
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Look no further amazing device
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for three days and no regrets what so ever. Bought it for my daughter as an introductory action cam but have been surprised by the amazing quality and construction. Works great underwater and has been able to keep up with my three and six year old. I am not sure how this holds up against other cameras but the image and sound quality are remarkable. Dont let the price fool you, your getting a fully functional device with a generous amount of accessories. Its simple enough for a 6 yr old to grasp the buttons and how to change mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: I am not a Pro and never will be
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pro so I did not want to spend a ton of money on an action camera. This camera came with everything I needed except an SD card. I mounted it to my helmet and it worked great. The picture was great and I was able to edit the video to enhance it. I only used this on my dirt bike and never tested it under water. Why pay over $300 when you can get four of these for under $300?
customer_reviews.author: Sara Schirner

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have taken the Apeman A80 on a couple of hikes (2 - 10 mile hikes) so far and the video quality is great and the camera works as expected. It would be best to have at least 4 batteries and 2 or more Micro SD Cards if you plan to record an entire 10+ mile hike. I am looking forward to capturing many more hikes with this action camera. I attached a pic and a short video I took with the A80.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Graff

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative To GoPro!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic! I have ordered two of these cameras already as gifts, and couldn't be happier with the response. I love the value of these little cameras. They come with just about all the mounts you need right out of the box, and 2 batteries so you can get right back into the action. When people tell me how much they want a GoPro I can't help but ask them "why?" When there's products that do about 95-98% of the job for a QUARTER of the price at LEAST! You can't go wrong with this camera. It's all you really need as a normal everyday consumer.
customer_reviews.author: ChampStamp

customer_reviews.title: but gave it a go due to the good reviews I read
customer_reviews.text: Was very skeptic about purchasing this, but gave it a go due to the good reviews I read. Let’s just say i wasn’t disappointed. It came in it’s own case with foam pre-cut. A lot of attachments. Quality of the camera??? Its worthy enough to take photos of my $100k car. I will update this review with rolling videos of my car when it’s up and going. You will not be disappointed with this action camera.
customer_reviews.author: phillip nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. No need to spend hundreds of dollars when this camera does it all. We have a swimmer in the family and this works great to get underwater shots. Easy to program and so easy to use. Not bulky at all. We love the packaging and the nice carry bag that comes with it. Pictures are clear and we were able to print them out easily as well. Great action shots for running as well. Now to buy a vest to attach it to and this will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for Use as an Action Cam...But Not Suitable as Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: I have several of ApeMan's products so I am a big proponent of this brand. When one of my dashcams recently stopped working, I thought this action cam would be a viable substitute, especially given some advice in the customer discussion area supporting that. For me...not the case. The camera is oriented in such a way that, I was not able to find any suction holding that would attach it at the correct angle, such that the picture would be right side up. Other than that, the action cam is great. But since it did not perform the action that I wanted, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveLogic

customer_reviews.title: Overall A Great Action Cam
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I would recommend buying an SD card designed for video. Maybe at a camera shop. The video quality was great. Clear out in the beach and under water while in the pool. The sound was pretty awesome too. My family and I are having fun recording some memories. Battery doesn’t last too long maybe a couple hours but you get two batteries. ( purchase yourself a portable charger) over all it’s easy to use. The apps are easy to use and allow for you to save the video straight to your phone. If you’re looking for an action cam for beginner or don’t want to break the bank, this is the one .
customer_reviews.author: Luis Macias

customer_reviews.title: First gift for my high school graduating senior
customer_reviews.text: I found this while looking through Amazon's numerous daily deals and missed it the first time around. Wasn't going to let that happen again. When presented with the opportunity again, I jumped at it. When making the purchase I was pleasantly surprised that it came with so many accessories. Many of which I am still waiting to try. Pros: The camera is light and study, picture and video quality is awesome. Cons: A little bit of a fisheye effect. (Just nitpicking)
customer_reviews.author: Green_Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera and mounting accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to figure out the process of working the menu but once you do it's very logical. Works great! Paper manual could be way more detailed and accurate. Big item: YOU NEED TO PURCHASE A MICRO SD CARD SEPARATELY. Inexpensive at Staples, not a big deal. Picture quality is amazing. It looks like a kids toy but gives professional results.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Best action camera at this price, I am happy to have it
customer_reviews.text: As the glance you will feel like Gro pro . I liked it very small and compact. Pictures are good and the video quality is excellent to . The best part is 4k video .Also i think most of people will love the pouch in which everything fit .Also have two battery. But no SD card .but i am happy with the price i got this .Wifi built in. Lots of stand and attachments. Overall best for the price
customer_reviews.author: Fayaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail yesterday, so I haven't had a chance to try out all it's features. I didn't need anything super fancy,I had to look up most of the features on it 'cause I didn't know what they were. I wanted a cheaper than a gopro camera that is waterproof for when I (eventually) get to go scuba diving again. Main reason I bought this was the price and the waterproof housing that came with it. The directions aren't very detailed; you have to push some buttons to figure it out on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: This action camera is made of quality material. The camera itself is waterproof so it can be well used under water as well. I am already own a GoPro so I can safely say the picture quality of this camera is at par with GoPro expensive camera but at a more cheap cost. Since this is designed to be waterproof, I want to test it out for snorkeling on my upcoming trip in Hawaii. Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Great video with decent attachments
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. It took great video. Of my daughter’s wedding on the beach at Disney’s Castaway Cay. There was a lot of wind, but the audio came though clearly - We did not use the waterproof case as that really muffles the sound. Easy to operate, but the instruction manual needs to be posted on the company’s web site as ours got displaced shortly after purchase. Battery life wa good and lasted about an hour. Suggest purchasing additional charger and batteries if using for long video shots. The company also needs to offer or refer a software package to merge the many video segments together.
customer_reviews.author: bf4548

customer_reviews.title: Camera itself is fantastic the accessories like the mounts that comes with are not brilliant quality
customer_reviews.text: for the money you will not find a better action camera! After 4 months and seven thousand miles of riding my motorcycle down through Mexico I can say this cameras battery life is pretty good compared to a GoPro and the image quality is the same or better. I will say it came with a lot of accessories most of which like the mounts broke fairly quickly. However for the price you cannot go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: First the battery compartment is very flakey: hard to open, and I am afraid it will break anytime. My major problem is with the WIFI: it just cannot stay connected to my iPhone X. Not satisfied at all. The reason I gave it two starts is that the camera is still usable without WIFI, and the menu is reasonable useful.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Vidoes
customer_reviews.text: I can only compete this camera with two other action cameras I have used, the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD & the Crosstour Action Camera Underwater Cam WiFi 1080P Full HD 12MP. Apeman is far superior than the other two mentioned. I can recommend this camera for it video quality, battery life and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Excellet product and and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and customer service. The camera is so beautiful and good performance. You guys will love this camera like I did. Good quality, easy to use and good resolution. Everything what you need and for the price too! The customer service is one of the best. I recommend this seller and this product to everyone. Sure I will do business again with this sell
customer_reviews.author: Obed Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It is made up of cheap quality  material
customer_reviews.text: This camera is made up of cheap quality material that only lasts for few days. Initially I thought it's a good camera but I was mistaken . This battery and the camera material are made of cheap materials and won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera, since I couldn’t pass up the lightning deal! Comparing it to videos of other name brand AC’s, this one seems to create videos just as good! I’m impressed with the quality of the camera, and the added accessories. The case is a nice touch, and seems like it would protect the camera very well. It would get an extra star, if the battery charger was included with the bundle. I can’t complain for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Singlephaser

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOES NOT HAVE NIGHT VISION!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because of one word on the description page. "NIGHT VISION" and this DOES NOT! I REPEAT. THIS DOES NOT HAVE NIGHT VISION. I HAVE POSTED A PICTURE OF WHAT THIS CAMERA LOOKS LIKE AT NIGHT! THE PICTURE IS SO DARK IT LOOKS LIKE THE PICTURE IS BLACK!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Strietelmeier

customer_reviews.title: so far it’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packed inside a Beautiful case and accessories. The nice carrying case had inside two batteries that you charge up in the camera itself. The safety waterproof case is super durable, I didn't try it underwater yet but I bet there won't be any problem. about the camera itself - Same size as a go-pro for much less $$, very lightweight and an excellent picture quality. ohh and the user interface is relatively simple. We took it to our trip to Greece a few weeks ago, it meets my needs and seems decent. What more could I ask for? In conclusion, Go for it. worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent action camera, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this right before a trip to Hawaii for diving. I didn't want to spend hundreds on a GoPro and saw this one had great reviews. I am extremely impressed with the quality of photos it took underwater! It went on six dives with me, up to 75 feet using the included waterproof housing. No leaks and performed great. All in all, this is a solid camera and i would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the 1st time we use it we were using it under water and the color was not good due it was changing from green to red and super light, we were thinking mybe beacause us changing it from underwater then out of the water and being in the ocean it was so bright out but can’t figure it out yet. Automatic color changing while using it was kind of not good!
customer_reviews.author: Josel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype.
customer_reviews.text: The camera definitely works and takes a decent picture. The downfall is in the inconvenience of both the video chunking itself into a million small pieces and the HORRIBLE software for downloading. Driving down CA coastal Rt. 1, the video “appeared” to be rolling, but the screen would go dark as if were timing out. When connecting later, no single file was larger 438kb, so I had dozens of tiny vids instead of 1 hr. of complete video that I could compress. On top of that, the WiFi connection keeps timing out and the app crashes CONSTANTLY. A huge disappointment that I will be returning as soon as I get back from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfying, a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was suprised by the material quality and feeling of buttons on camera. They look and operates firmly and regularly. Accessories are of good appearance and compatible with GoPro, a real alternative for that expensive brand. Only little problem is absence of external microphone connection, which can be necessary on some jobs. But the built in microphone has good quality anyway. Recommended product up to now.
customer_reviews.author: Valter S. Prieto Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the lens  :(
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera. Good price and value. My biggest issue is that the lens sticks out beyond the body and with out protection it scratches very easily. It grew a few small scratches from everyday use. And the lens was destroyed. Tried to buff out with a headlight restoration kit and still has a flawed picture. Sure wish I had noticed it before the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricPurple

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is not good in 1080 60fps
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is good for a cheap camera for 2016 but not for 2018. Images do not look sharp, contrast is too high and there is no way to change it. I really doubt that the 20MP sensor claim is true. Their site does not show any downloadable firmware so this is a disposable camera that won't get any future updates. The only good aspect is that battery does last over 1 hour when recording at 1080 60fps
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I just received camera yesterday and haven't actually used it yet. I'm not tech savy so I'm taking my time reading instructions and getting familiar. And I forgot to order a micro SD card . There are a lot of accessories included and I'm not sure what they're all for, I just hope I don't have to ask my kids for help! I also really like that everything came in one handy carry case!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Milburn

customer_reviews.title: GoPro??? APEMAN A80 is just as good!!!
customer_reviews.text: After comparing different video cameras that are comparable to a Go Pro, I decided on the APEMAN A80 action camera and I'm very pleased! The quality is amazing and the price is hard to beat. What's even more am amazing is all the accessories that come with it and the extra battery. The only issue I have had is trying to figure out how to attach the camera in the waterproof case to the clip that attaches to a backpack or chest strap. Still, this is a great quality camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Church

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and Great sevice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't yet tried the product yet but the camera looks to be good quality. Battery charged fast. Picture quality on the camera looks good but have not taken photos or used the video recording. Love that it comes in a case Shipping was fast and packaging was great!
customer_reviews.author: tishabenn

customer_reviews.title: Clear & Compact Dash Cam but a Bit Difficult...
customer_reviews.text: It's relatively simple to use and setup, but not too user-friendly. Pros: Lightweight, easy to mount, decent motion-detection, clear video. Cons: Menu not simple to navigate, battery life isn't the best (need to charge daily), not easy to upload videos, hard to figure out how to sync with app.
customer_reviews.author: William O.

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. No instructional booklet. Had to go on line to see how to work the camera. Second, will not accept SD card. It clicks in but camera does not ead it. Have tried 2 brand new cards. Same result. Missed the return window by 2 days. Customer support offered through Amazon, a joke. The link won't accept my phone number. Looks like i'm eating the cost of this crappy camera
customer_reviews.author: regina ramage

customer_reviews.title: This is made of high quality stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've never personally owned an action camera, but I've been around them for a while. This one feels just like the other ones like GoPro. It's super light but it feels solid and well built. It's easy to use and it comes with a bunch of accessories. You can't beat this price. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until water got inside the waterproof case , then it died
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little camera especially given the price for a few months. When held in hand on the floating stick it was fine. I guess the waterproof case got a little old a little fast. After 6 months I mounted it on my surfboard and then after 20 minutes the case got water inside and the camera died :( So it is not waterproof forever. The rubber joints must get old fast.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use snowboarding and mountain biking. He loves it! We're not professional cinematographers and didn't need something to produce cinema quality movies for the masses. Product works great, has held up to bumps and spills down some mountains and keeps on kicking! Bought extra batteries just in case. Definitely not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was planning to use it as a dash cam to record conversations in the vehicle, potential backdrops, etc. It exceeded my expectations in certain areas. I wasn't aware that this is capable of being used as a webcam! Really nice feature. I have yet to try it as the dash cam but so far the biggest problem I can see with that is the vibrations from the roads here could make it jittery. Other than that the only other thing I can think of is vibrancy of colors.... But for crying out loud it is an action cam not a BlackMagicDesign Mini or anything like that! Does it's job, and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: rag1957

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is amazing. It takes great videos. I only have used it for my children;s basketball games but it's great. It provides a wide image so I can get half a court when they are on either side of the court and I don't miss any shots taken by each team. I still have to learn how to use all it's features, but so far I love this camera and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: N. DaCosta

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera!! In my opinion, it is a GoPro killer!!! Love the fact that you get so many accessories! Battery life is great! Picture and clarity are AMAZING!!! Just having a small issue, seems that it only records in bursts lasting about 3-5 mins at a time. It's an issue for me because I got it mainly to record my son's soccer matches. If anyone knows if I'm missing something in the settings please let me know!!
customer_reviews.author: ginger_gun_toter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in a lightweight camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to attach to my drone. It is light weight, which is important for flying. One negative is that the WiFi interface to start/stop the camera from my phone and the controls of the drone apparently interfere with each other, so the only way I can record is to start the camera before take off and stop it on landing. I did not ding the camera on stars because of this, since it isn't an advertised capability/compatibility. Excellent video quality. Lots of fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am impressed with camera, specially with the price. Bought it to mount on a iSteadyPro stabilizer for snow skiing. It fit OK. Wish they had covered the usb/hdmi ports, Don't know how you would update firmware if they even have any. Pros: Price Cons: Not water resistant without case, documentation, website, ability to update firmware
customer_reviews.author: Husky45

customer_reviews.title: Apeman Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and found the Apeman Camera very highly rated so I purchased one and some accessories for my kayaking and camping adventures and I must say I am extremely please with the ease of use and quality of the product. I will definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking for a product like this. The case and accessories in the case are exceptional and I really looking forward to using this camera a lot. Thank you Apeman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture qulity but freezes up after one vacation
customer_reviews.text: The quality of photos, video and audio is inline with the price. However, after using on just one vacation the camera freezes up when cycling through the modes. In order to unfreeze the screen the camera has to be powered off and back on again. This is extremely inconvenient and basically makes the camera useless.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The clarity of the pictures is good and in diving mode the color is good also! For the price it's a great underwater camera. I got everything I needed to take good quality photos. I think that was a good investment. It's also really easy to use. The instructions are simple and there are plenty of options in the menu.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 17 year old daughter in hopes that she would use it while we went on our cruise. Well, I am happy to say that we are getting our moneys worth with this product. She uses it for everything. The experience with shopping for this item was great. I highly recommend this camera and placing the order on line. Its everything it states and more!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot prior to purchasing which Action Camera would fit my budget and my needs. With so many to choose from it was hard to know which ones were any good, and which ones would be a lesson learned of should have spent more rather than wasting the money. The Apeman A87 is amazing for the price! It is much better than I was expecting in quality and performance. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: So I got this camera for some pov footage when i go skiing and the like, and it works really well. I was surprised at the quality of this camera for the price. This blows all GoPros out of the water because an equal quality camera + the case and all the attachments probably would have been above $350. Also the streaming and wifi works good on this camera and i really enjoy being able to watch the footage without having to take out the mirco sd card every time. Although the battery life is not good, batteries are super cheap so you can have a bunch of them ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: This action camera worked way better than expected. I assumed that the pictures and videos were probably going to be blah or crap quality. I was so wrong. The picture and video quality are great. Cons - The menu system is annoying - The WiFi connectivity can be annoying too - Battery life could be better Pros - Picture and video quality are awesome - Case is indeed waterproof (not a drop in the case) - Price! Can’t beat a $60 action camera with quality photos and videos
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: 10 year-old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year-old daughter to start taking videos and in the very first one, she told us how much she loves it! I figured it all out, formatted the SD card, and had it up and running in 10 minutes -- at the same time, there's a full menu of options that will keep the whole family trying things out for a long time. We love it, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hardy Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this action camera for the price I paid. I took this on a trip to Mexico and it took some awesome videos and pictures under the water! The quality isn’t 100% perfect but it’s exactly what I wanted to take on my trip as I didn’t want to dish out hundreds of dollars for a Go-Pro. I’ve had for a few weeks and used it both days in Mexico and tested it out at the beach before my vacation. I definitely reccomend this product if you’re looking for a cheap action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, great WP case.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, GoPro does have a better stabilizer but this one's is more than good enough for me. The gyroscope is also pretty cool bc whenever I turn my head too fast it makes it look smooth. I use it for airsoft, mountain biking, swimming, driving, fishing etc... I ended up buying another one. The waterproof casing is very durable too, it took a direct hit from an airsoft gun right in the lens and not even a scratch. For low light situations it's not terrible, but not the best. I love this camera, I'll probably end up getting another one. Overall, it's awesome. (To see video go to my YouTube, it's my username here. Shameless plug)
customer_reviews.author: Eclipse Ironman

customer_reviews.title: Cheeply made
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for a cheep GoPro knockoff. But don’t get to excited. You will get what you pay for here. If you want a cheep knock about sports camera with little expectations for quality, then buy it. But you may be better off getting a used GoPro on ebay.
customer_reviews.author: JSC24L

customer_reviews.title: very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a separate camera that I could carry with me all the time without having to take my phone out. This camera is very lightweight! I mean, real light! There are many settings like a real camera and you could set it up exactly how you want it. It also comes with a whole slew of accessories as well.
customer_reviews.author: ntsworld

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t flip the video image, but does have EIS!  Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty pleased with this action camera. I haven’t been able to figure out the flip the recording. The only other cautionary warning is the shutter button on the case actually gets corroded. I was able to get it working again with some WD40/PB Blaster. It doesn’t effect the water proofing. If you’re looking for a good action camera with decent EIS, this is a pretty good choice!
customer_reviews.author: David L Russell

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This appeared great at first but there was no manual. The video is in fast forward. So it does no good to video anything and the default is video. It is useless to me. Can use GoPro accessories but doesn't matter if you can't get videos.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter action camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera so I was leery about getting and using it. It's very user-friendly and for such an inexpensive camera, it comes with a lot of accessories and takes decent video and pictures. I took it on scuba vacation and am really happy with the clips. The camera could really benefit from a red filter which apeman unfortunately doesn't make for its cameras. I am very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi W

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Love
customer_reviews.text: I have shot a week of things--including under the water--in Maui and am impressed. I only shoot in 1080 due to the 60 fps (frames per second); the 4k drops to 30 fps. It comes with 2 batteries and the waterproof case is simple and waterproof. I found this reviewed on youtube and decided to give it a shot and am very happy--especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: azjoe_63

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to take with me on vacation to the Caribbean. I went scuba diving and wanted this particular one because it had diving mode. We went about 90 ft and my videos and pictures came out very good! There is a little bit of a bubble effect on some pictures and videos but I don’t mind. It’s a pretty great quality for the price!! So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam! Especially considering the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an actual GoPro, but after using this I'm not sure I will. I use this camera primary as a helmet cam for biking. The video and sound are really clear. I am really happy with the ease of use and the amount of accessories that come with this camera. Especially considering the price it cost. If you are looking for an action cam but don't want to pay the price of a GoPro, and don't mind slightly less quality (per the comparison vidoes I looked at before purchasing) get this. You'll be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elchanan

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Case Included? Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this a 5 star mainly because I was very surprised about the included storage case. I either missed that in the description or it was a change. This camera is similar to my last one that was stolen (no case), so I'm sure the quality willbe better since its 4k. The other thing I noticed is the camera is secure in the waterproof housing. My last camera was not. I had to use moleskin to make it tight. Very pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Rain Camper

customer_reviews.title: Time lapse does not saves individual pictures it saves as video.
customer_reviews.text: Time-lapse does not saves the individual pictures, unlike other sport camera. The time-lapse is only done in video mode so there will be no individual pictures. This was also confirmed by APEMAN tech support. I want to have control on the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sinelas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and easy to use. I was surprised by the quality of pictures and videos this camera is capable of specially for the price. Would recommend, I find it very useful for our vacations since it’s waterproof and we always go to the Caribbean snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Aviles

product_meta.title: APEMAN A80 Action Camera 4K 20MP Wi-Fi Sports Cam 4X Zoom EIS 40M Waterproof Underwater Camcoder with 19 Accessories and Carring Case, for Yutube/Vlog Videos
feature_bullets: 4K ACTION CAMERA WITH 20MP: APEMAN A80 action camera features 4K 24FPS, 2K/30fps, 1080P/60FPS video, and 20MP photo resolution enables you to take incredible photos and capture every exciting moment.

ADJUSTABLE WIDE ANGLE AND ANTI-SHAKING: This sports camera offers you 4 view angles(170°, 140°, 110°, and 70°) to choose from, provides you with a much broader amazing perspective. Built-in smart gyroscope and anti-shaking mode delivers steady and smooth videos. Ideal for shooting outdoor activities.

BUILT-IN WIFI and HDMI OUTPUT: Share and edit videos or images easily. Download the free app (OK Cam or FN Cam) on your smart phone or tablet to take full control of the camera in real time. HDMI, USB and AV video output are available for connecting computers, TVs and projectors.

VARIOUS PHOTO and VIDEO RECORDING MODE: Support Loop Recording, Car mode, Diving mode,Timer-shoot capture modes like Time Lapse. By choosing a time interval, you can appreciate and record a process of the changes that take place at every moment in every corner of the world, like sunrise and sunset, flowers bloom, tide ebb, etc.

HIGH QUALITY WATERPROOF CASE and MUTI-ACCESSORIES: The High-quality waterproof case can make this camera work normally for even underwater 40 meters. Dual 1050mAh batteries, special designed portable carrying bag, and multi accessories can meet your needs for any outdoor activities

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,588 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
